name: Manacircle
description:
★Wishlist on Steam★

Welcome to Manacircle. This game is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and solving the problem in a way.

Our heroine "Clair" is trying to find the representative of Costoria with her new mysterious partner "Player".

But when she takes a step into the deep unknown. new faces and new troubles on the way and she needs to solve the problem in a way that only she can do.

The journey to find the true meaning of Manacircle has begun!

Controls

Or you can use your Xbox Controller too!!
